Package gruppe.irc

This package contains the IRCConnection class itself and the MessageEvent class that is used to pass information about events from the IRCConnection class to the attached listener objects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeChooser
    This class is taking care of all the attribute action.
    ChannelList
    This class is for the listing of channels.
    ChannelTab
    The layout of a channeltab, it extends GenericTab to get some of the mutual functions for all tabs, but it also need some specificed functionality.
    GenericTab
    Greetings.
    IRCClient
    This class is the main class of the IRC - Client.
    IRCClientFrame  
    IRCConnection
    This class controls the connection to a IRC server.
    JFontChooser
    The JFontChooser class is a swing component for font selection.
    LoginMenu
    This class is a simple loginmenu
    MessageEvent
    Class used to pass information about a message between the IRCConnection class and its listeners.
    MessageHandler
    Class made for handling all message-events that occurs in our client
    PersonalTab
    Class for the personalTabs, basic functionality inherited from GenericTab.
    ServerEditorWindow
    Simple window used for adding a server to the 'servers.ini'-file.
    ServerListItem
    A class that holds information about one line in the servers.ini file.
    ServerTab
    Inherits properties from GenericTab, and is the tab where the server-messages are displayed.
    SimpleAttributes
    This is the class where our color and font options are stored.
    StyleItem
    This class contains information about each style.
    TabManager  

Package gruppe.irc Description

This package contains the IRCConnection class itself and the MessageEvent class that is used to pass information about events from the IRCConnection class to the attached listener objects. For information about the MessageListener interface and the predefined listener objects please see the no.hig.okolloen.irc.messageListeners package.
